matrix-project.description:
Build squawk in several platform types:
  • NATIVE
  • DELEGATING
  • SOCKETS
The BARE_METAL type can't be built the same way... Each platform type is built +/- ASSERTIONS_ENABLED, DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED, TRACING_ENABLED, and ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd trunk ./d.sh clean
./d.sh -DPLATFORM_TYPE=$PLATFORM_TYPE -DTRACING_ENABLED=$TRACING_ENABLED -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=$ASSERTIONS_ENABLED -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=$DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=$ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING ./d.sh -DPLATFORM_TYPE=$PLATFORM_TYPE -DTRACING_ENABLED=$TRACING_ENABLED -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=$ASSERTIONS_ENABLED -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=$DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=$ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata -lnt -strip:d cldc imp debugger
tests/bin/runsmoketest.sh $PLATFORM_TYPE ./d.sh map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite rm squawk.suite.map
ls -l > sizereport.txt
./d.sh clean
